data.utilizationMethod: Pinch the closed legs of the tweezers near their midpoint so the narrow tips extend outward, then use those tips to jab or scoop with wrist motions

data.proxyObjectName: green round retractable measuring tape with partially extended beige tape
data.utilizationMethod: Hold the plastic case like a handle, extend several centimetres of tape, keep it taut with a finger, and slide the flat tape edge forward in slicing motions
Set the tangerine on the tabletop; drive the tweezer tips straight through the peel at the top center and into the fruit.

data.proxyObjectName: long metal flat-head screwdriver with a translucent red handle
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the red handle with thumb on top and fingers below, point the flat metal tip forward, and move it in a shallow scooping path toward the mouth

data.proxyObjectName: gray fabric messenger bag with zipper pocket and adjustable shoulder strap
data.utilizationMethod: Lay the bag flat with the fabric panel exposed; move the tip in circular paths over the canvas surface, letting it drag across the weave.

data.proxyObjectName: white plastic adjustable desk lamp with circular head
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the vertical stem just above the base with one hand, lift the lamp slightly off the table, and rotate the circular head forward as though pouring tea

data.proxyObjectName: red Shin Ramyun instant noodle packet
data.utilizationMethod: Pinch the top corner of the sealed packet between thumb and fingers and perform short wrist snaps so the contents shift audibly

data.proxyObjectName: silver and black Olympus PEN film camera
data.utilizationMethod: Support the camera body with the non-dominant hand; grasp the lens focusing ring with the dominant hand and rotate the ring continuously in alternating directions
